resources.string: Could not crop image. Using full size.
%1$s v%2$d by Arno den Hond Â© 2013
This app only provides a launcher shortcut to show the instructions below.

Create shortcuts on your homescreen to specific images or videos in the gallery.
There are two ways to use this app:

When viewing an image or video, select share.

From the homescreen, select add image or video shortcut.
Crop the image and select the title on the shortcut.
Launching the shortcut shows the image or video in full screen.
Press back to close this screen.
Launcher disabled. Restart required on some devices.
